alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, northeastern Lincoln, Florence, northern Marinette, eastern Oneida and northern Langlade Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Iron River to 7 miles southwest of Headwaters Wilderness to 9 miles northeast of Parrish. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wisconsin Slough Natural Area around 730 PM CDT. Crandon, Popple River and Whisker Lake Wilderness around 740 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Woodlawn, Carter, Goodman and McCaslin Mountain Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.
